snippet: An event in Broome County, N.Y., will highlight the economic opportunities that natural gas development offers, including jobs for engineers, land surveyors, mechanics, welders, and wildlife and wetland specialists
abstract: An event in Broome County, N.Y., will highlight the economic opportunities that natural gas development offers, including jobs for engineers, land surveyors, mechanics, welders, and wildlife and wetland specialists

headline.main: For Job Seekers, a Fracking Fair
